fields.description:
h5.Description

When downloading an SDK using {{ti sdk install -b master -d}} Blackberry is present.

h5.Steps To Reproduce

1. Run either {{appc ti sdk install -b master -d}} or {{ti sdk install -b master -d}}
2. Open the SDK folder

h5.Actual Result

The SDK folder will contain Blackberry

h5.Expected Result

We have deprecated Blackberry so the folder should not be present
fields.summary: Blackberry is present in SDKs downloaded from master branch
fields.environment:
Windows 8.1, Mac OSX 10.10.3
Titanium SDK build: 4.1.0.v20150521133621
Titanium CLI : 4.1.0-dev

comments.body: Build 4.1.0.v20150522041518 and later has BB removed.

Verified using:

Windows 8.1, Mac OS 10.10.3
Titanium SDK: 4.1.0.v20150522094646

The SDK folder no longer contains Blackberry

Closing ticket
